feature_welcome--> """ Welcome to the Hackathon Aggregator app!
• Discover numerous hackathons around the world. • Save your favorite events. • Never miss a deadline with our reminders. • Join hackathons directly from the app. • Meet like-minded people and form teams. • Track your hackathon achievements.
Let's start hacking! """
